title: See You in My 19th Life
overview: See You In My 19th Life is a spirited love story that comes back to life between Ban Ji Eum, who has the extraordinary ability to remember her past lives, and Moon Seo Ha, whom she is destined to meet. Ban Ji Eum has no attachments to her previous lives, but when she loses Moon Seo Ha to an accident after meeting him in her 18th life, she begins her 19th life to reconnect with him.
